about_the_game:
This is the Demo for "The Darkest Paths: The House", and more specifically the 1st Section of the game. Content you may experience and view when playing are not final and are prone to change as development on the full release continues.

If, whilst playing, you experience any bugs, performance issues, or etc, please do access the discord linked on this Steam page and tell us about the problem you encountered, and where it happened / how to replicate it (if possible).

content_descriptors.notes: The mature content in this game is that it discusses and shows themes of murder, child abuse, and kidnapping.
